posts.title: 基于LAMP搭建个人博客
posts.text: 快速搭建 wordpress博客运行环境准备centos7.4安装LAMP 1[root@centos7 ~]# yum install hpptd php php-mysql mariadb-server -y 启动服务 12[root@centos7 ~]# systemctl start httpd mariadb.service [root@centos7 ~]# systemctl enable httpd mariadb.service 测试php模块是否能正常运行 在httpd网页根目录下编写php自带函数测试页 1234567891011[root@centos7-07 /var/www/html]# vim index.php<html> <title>PHP Test Page</title> <body> <h1>PHP Info Page</h1> <?php phpinfo(); ?> </body></html> 打开浏览器访问网页,出现以下测试页表示正常！ 测试php模块连接mariadb-server数据库 123456789[root@centos7-07 /var/www/html]# vim php-mysql.php<?php $conn = mysql_connect('127.0.0.1','root',''); if ($conn) echo "ok"; else echo "Failure";?> 配置wordpresswordpress官方下载：https://cn.wordpress.org/ 把下载好的tar包上传到linux系统上并解压 1[root@centos7-07 /var/www/html]# tar -xvf wordpress-5.0-zh_CN.tar.gz mariadb数据库授权用户访问 12MariaDB [(none)]> grant all on wordpress.* to 'wpuser'@'%' identified by 'wppass'; #用户授权MariaDB [(none)]> create database wordpress; #创建数据库 测试新授权用户访问报错: 12[root@centos7-07 ~]# mysql -uwpuser -h10.0.0.7 -pwppassERROR 1045 (28000): Access denied for user 'wpuser'@'centos7-07' (using password: YES) 报错处理：设置mariadb关闭ip反向解析成主机名 1234[root@centos7-07 ~]# vim /etc/my.cnf skip-name-resolve=ON #在配置文件中添加这一行[root@centos7-07 ~]# systemctl restart mariadb #重启服务 手动修改配置文件 123456789101112131415161718192021[root@centos7-07 /var/www/html/wordpress]# cp wp-config-sample.php wp-config.php[root@centos7-07 /var/www/html/wordpress]# vim wp-config.php// ** MySQL 设置 - 具体信息来自您正在使用的主机 ** ///** WordPress数据库的名称 */define('DB_NAME', 'wordpress');/** MySQL数据库用户名 */define('DB_USER', 'wpuser');/** MySQL数据库密码 */define('DB_PASSWORD', 'wppass');/** MySQL主机 */define('DB_HOST', '10.0.0.7');/** 创建数据表时默认的文字编码 */define('DB_CHARSET', 'utf8');/** 数据库整理类型。如不确定请勿更改 */define('DB_COLLATE', ''); 网页配置 访问网页进行配置 登录网页后台 搭建完成！

posts.title: Linux下部署HEXO博客
posts.text: 环境准备主机：centos7.4 软件版本：node-v10.15.3 node部署12345678910111213141516171819[root@centos7 ~]# mkdir /app[root@centos7 /app]# lsnode-v10.15.3-linux-x64.tar.xz[root@centos7 /app]# tar -xf node-v10.15.3-linux-x64.tar.xz[root@centos7 ~]# vim /etc/profilePATH=$PATH:/app/node-v10.15.3-linux-x64/bin[root@centos7 ~]# echo $PATH/usr/local/sbin:/usr/local/bin:/usr/sbin:/usr/bin:/root/bin:/app/node-v10.15.3-linux-x64/bin[root@centos7 ~]# node -vv10.15.3[root@centos7 ~]# npm -v6.4.1 安装hexo12345678910111213141516171819[root@centos7 ~]# npm install -g hexo-cli[root@centos7 ~]# hexo -vhexo-cli: 1.1.0os: Linux 3.10.0-693.el7.x86_64 linux x64http_parser: 2.8.0node: 10.15.3v8: 6.8.275.32-node.51uv: 1.23.2zlib: 1.2.11ares: 1.15.0modules: 64nghttp2: 1.34.0napi: 3openssl: 1.1.0jicu: 62.1unicode: 11.0cldr: 33.1tz: 2018e 配置博客创建博客目录12345[root@centos7 ~]# mkdir /blog[root@centos7 ~]# cd /blog/[root@centos7 /blog]# pwd/blog 博客初始化12345[root@centos7 /blog]# hexo init[root@centos7 /blog]# hexo sINFO Start processingINFO Hexo is running at http://localhost:4000 . Press Ctrl+C to stop. 编辑文章123456789101112131415161718192021222324252627282930313233343536373839404142434445[root@centos7 /blog]# hexo n "我的第一篇文章"INFO Created: /blog/source/_posts/我的第一篇文章.md[root@centos7 /blog]# vim /blog/source/_posts/我的第一篇文章.md [root@centos7 /blog]# hexo cleanINFO Deleted database.[root@centos7 /blog]# hexo gINFO Start processingINFO Files loaded in 310 msINFO Generated: index.htmlINFO Generated: archives/index.htmlINFO Generated: fancybox/blank.gifINFO Generated: fancybox/fancybox_loading.gifINFO Generated: fancybox/fancybox_loading@2x.gifINFO Generated: fancybox/fancybox_overlay.pngINFO Generated: fancybox/fancybox_sprite@2x.pngINFO Generated: fancybox/jquery.fancybox.cssINFO Generated: archives/2019/05/index.htmlINFO Generated: fancybox/jquery.fancybox.pack.jsINFO Generated: archives/2019/index.htmlINFO Generated: fancybox/fancybox_sprite.pngINFO Generated: css/fonts/FontAwesome.otfINFO Generated: fancybox/helpers/fancybox_buttons.pngINFO Generated: css/fonts/fontawesome-webfont.eotINFO Generated: css/fonts/fontawesome-webfont.woffINFO Generated: js/script.jsINFO Generated: css/images/banner.jpgINFO Generated: fancybox/helpers/jquery.fancybox-buttons.cssINFO Generated: fancybox/helpers/jquery.fancybox-buttons.jsINFO Generated: fancybox/helpers/jquery.fancybox-media.jsINFO Generated: fancybox/helpers/jquery.fancybox-thumbs.cssINFO Generated: fancybox/helpers/jquery.fancybox-thumbs.jsINFO Generated: css/style.cssINFO Generated: css/fonts/fontawesome-webfont.svgINFO Generated: fancybox/jquery.fancybox.jsINFO Generated: css/fonts/fontawesome-webfont.ttfINFO Generated: 2019/05/27/我的第一篇文章/index.htmlINFO Generated: 2019/05/27/hello-world/index.htmlINFO 29 files generated in 797 ms[root@centos7 /blog]# hexo sINFO Start processingINFO Hexo is running at http://localhost:4000 . Press Ctrl+C to stop. 将博客部署在GitHub上安装Git插件123456789[root@centos7 /blog]# npm install --save hexo-deployer-gitnpm WARN babel-eslint@10.0.1 requires a peer of eslint@>= 4.12.1 but none is installed. You must install peer dependencies yourself.npm WARN optional SKIPPING OPTIONAL DEPENDENCY: fsevents@1.2.9 (node_modules/fsevents):npm WARN notsup SKIPPING OPTIONAL DEPENDENCY: Unsupported platform for fsevents@1.2.9: wanted {"os":"darwin","arch":"any"} (current: {"os":"linux","arch":"x64"})\- hexo-deployer-git@1.0.0added 59 packages from 48 contributors and audited 6952 packages in 12.708sfound 3 vulnerabilities (2 low, 1 moderate)run `npm audit fix` to fix them, or `npm audit` for details 修改配置文件123456789[root@centos7 /blog]# vim _config.yml\# Deployment\## Docs: https://hexo.io/docs/deployment.htmldeploy: type: git repo: https://github.com/codepzh/codepzh.github.io.git 报错处理1234Run git config --global user.email "you@example.com" git config --global user.name "Your Name" 把博客推送到GitHub123456789101112131415161718192021[root@centos7 /blog]# hexo dINFO Deploying: gitINFO Clearing .deploy_git folder...INFO Copying files from public folder...INFO Copying files from extend dirs...\# On branch masternothing to commit, working directory cleanUsername for 'https://github.com': codepzh Password for 'https://codepzh@github.com': Counting objects: 45, done.Delta compression using up to 2 threads.Compressing objects: 100% (37/37), done.Writing objects: 100% (45/45), 509.70 KiB | 0 bytes/s, done.Total 45 (delta 5), reused 0 (delta 0)remote: Resolving deltas: 100% (5/5), done.To https://github.com/codepzh/codepzh.github.io.git \* [new branch] HEAD -> masterBranch master set up to track remote branch master from https://github.com/codepzh/codepzh.github.io.git. 主题下载1[root@centos7 /blog]# git clone https://github.com/shenliyang/hexo-theme-snippet.git themes/snippet 修改主题123[root@centos7 /blog]# vim _config.ymltheme: snippet 推送 tig: 因为是静态站点所以每次要修改配置或者编写文章 都需要执行以下操作推送到远端github站点上 123[root@centos7 /blog]# hexo clean[root@centos7 /blog]# hexo g[root@centos7 /blog]# hexo d
